snippet: Main visa index listing many country visa pages (Australia, Canada, Belgium, Netherlands, Poland, Germany, Italy, Hungary, Greece, Czech Republic, etc.).
Azerbaijan Visa for Pakistani Citizen - describes electronic authorization linked to passport and lists many countries they deal with.
Hungary Visa for Pakistani Citizen - documents required include passport, visa form, bank statements, travel insurance, flight itineraries.
Uzbekistan Visa details and note that they deal in many regional visas.
Nepal Visit Visa for Pakistani - lists required documents (passport, photos, online application, bank statement, return ticket, hotel booking).
Poland Visa for Pakistani Citizen - mentions Schengen visa rules (90 days within 6 months).
Thailand eVisa for Pakistan - page notes availability and outlines requirements and application steps.
Singapore Visa for Pakistani Citizen - general info and links to check visa status.
Sri Lanka Visa requirements, fees (example: tourist visa fees in PKR), processing time, embassy details in Islamabad.
Hong Kong Visa requirements page with contact details and list of services.
Kazakhstan visa for Pakistan - includes embassy info and notes on e-visa availability.
Vietnam visa info page listing requirements and services offered.
Czech Republic visa page â€” Schengen visa explanation and requirements.
France Schengen visa assistance - general info about Schengen visa services.
